channel.title: CVE Feed for IBAX -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBAX -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3798|2024-08-03T01:20:57.781Z -- ibax -- go-ibax
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in IBAX go-ibax. Affected is an unknown function of the file /api/v2/open/tablesInfo. The manipulation leads to sql injection. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-212634 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-3799|2024-08-03T01:20:58.319Z -- ibax -- go-ibax
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in IBAX go-ibax. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /api/v2/open/tablesInfo. The manipulation leads to sql injection. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212635.

item.title: CVE-2022-3800|2024-08-03T01:20:57.678Z -- ibax -- go-ibax
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in IBAX go-ibax. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /api/v2/open/rowsInfo. The manipulation of the argument table_name leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212636.

item.title: CVE-2022-3801|2024-08-03T01:20:57.627Z -- ibax -- go-ibax
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in IBAX go-ibax. This affects an unknown part of the file /api/v2/open/rowsInfo. The manipulation of the argument order leads to sql injection. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-212637 was assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-3802|2024-08-03T01:20:58.334Z -- ibax -- go-ibax
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in IBAX go-ibax and classified as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /api/v2/open/rowsInfo. The manipulation of the argument where leads to sql injection. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-212638 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.
